title: 4183-B, Please Respond. (SCP-4183 painting)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --pale-accent: 210, 96, 20;
    --bright-accent: 194, 108, 33;
    --medium-accent: 204, 116, 57;
    --dark-accent: 179, 82, 4;
    --alt-accent: 136, 221, 17;
}
[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=4183.png
| caption=A hand-painting with acrylic and pen of SCP-4183
| width=1000px
| align=center]]

[[=]]
I created a smaller painting as a gift to a friend on SCP-4183 using acrylics and pen! Another favorite SCP article of mine while focusing on the simplistic and imagery-centric side of the emotional dialogue from the article.
[[/=]]
